name: Pop The Rings - Free Fun Addictive Games
name_original: Pop The Rings - Free Fun Addictive Games
description:
Pop The Rings - New super tap addiction. Simple to play. Tap at the right time to lock the rings and progress to the next level. Put your reflexes to the test and compete with other players to be the best.

Pop The Rings includes:
- Simple one-touch controls
- Infinite custom designed levels
- Retro style graphics and effects
- Fun sounds and music
- Battle your friends score with Game Center
- Guide to play the game.

How to play:
1. Tap the screen at right time when ring overlaps the target ring
2. Don't let the ring to go out of the target ring

Fun for all ages.

Please Write a Review and Rate the game to help us making more free cooler games for you!!

Have a nice day!
